cause.description:
For those who believe in true freedom across the world. Too many are enslaved by the capitalist exploitation in America and the rest of the world.
Rise up fellow workers and throw off the chains of the capitalists that enslave you.
POWER TO THE PROLETARIAT!
1. Capitialism is inherently explotative
2. Communism is the only way to ensure none are exploited or enslaved
3. Concerted effort of commited communists and socialists is necessary to jumpstart the dialectic process of revolution
cause.mission: Throw off the chains of capitalism in America and the World
cause.name: Socialist Revolution in America and the World
